short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Ctrl+N and Ctrl+P to navigate up and down in dropdowns

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your web browsing with CtrlNP! Perfect for Vim users who prefer to stay in the keyboard flow while navigating. No more reaching for the arrow keys, our extension allows you to move up and down dropdown menus with the simple keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+P and Ctrl+N. Experience seamless navigation, just like on Unix systems. Download now and make your web browsing experience more efficient and enjoyable!

Check the code on Github: https://github.com/justalemming/ctrlnp
